groups.name: The Midnight Brainstorm
groups.description: A creative hub for night owls, thinkers, and dreamers! Whether you're a writer, artist, coder, or just someone with random 2 AM thoughts, this is the place to share ideas, get feedback, and connect with like-minded insomniacs.
